name: Spelling (Victor Matheus)
description:
welcome to spelling

In this game a random word will be shown at the top of the screen and below it you will have several bubbles to pop.

Pop the bubbles with the letters of the drawn word in the correct order to win.

The game is complete when the word is spelled out completely and your result is the time it took you to spell out the word completely.

Complete it in the shortest time possible and remember: whenever you pop a bubble with the wrong letter you will incur a time penalty.

Good game!
